item.title: A small update, v0.0.9 is available.
item.description: v0.0.9 is a small update with some internal bug fixes and a couple quality of life improvements. Please read the changelog for the full list of changes in this update. As always, thank you for using Owncast! Don’t hesitate to share your thoughts, opinions, and what you’ve been streaming.

item.title: One quick question about how you customize Owncast.
item.description: We’d like to know if you take advantage of the supplied HTML, Javascript and CSS to customize your page. Click to answer. Note: The poll is hosted on a 3rd party site not operated by Owncast.
